name: Pikachu PokéStop Showcase
title: Pikachu PokéStop Showcase
description: There will be a PokéStop Showcase featuring Pikachu on Thursday, February 26 (local time). The Showcase starts and ends on Thursday. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

name: Pikachu PokéStop Showcase
title: Pikachu PokéStop Showcase
description: There will be a PokéStop Showcase featuring Pikachu on Friday, February 27 (local time). The Showcase starts and ends on Friday. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

name: Road to Kalos
title: Road to Kalos
description: We’re en route to Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos, and we can’t forget about an important stop along the way: the Road to Kalos event! Before Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global begins on February 28, 2026, you’re invited to this week-long “rewind” of previous GO Tour events, which celebrate the Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, Sinnoh, and Unova regions! Plus, early readings are showing that certain Legendary Pokémon, previously featured at each GO Tour event, are getting ready to reappear… Could this be the work of the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa? Trainers attending the in-person Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos events in Tainan and Los Angeles can jump into the Kalos-inspired fun even sooner! Check out the event site for more details on how to attend. Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global is a free event available to all Trainers on Saturday, February 28, and Sunday, March 1, 2026, from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time. Learn more about the event and purchase tickets here !

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
description: Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Web Store Join millions of Trainers across the globe for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global! Take part in this worldwide event inspired by the Kalos region, first featured in Pokémon X and Pokémon Y on the Nintendo 3DS. Get ready to experience new gameplay inspired by the stories and characters of Pokémon X and Pokémon Y. From longtime Kalos fans to new Trainers picking up Pokémon GO for the first time, anyone can take part in this exciting two-day event at no cost! Looking to enhance your GO Tour adventure with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store !

name: GO Pass: Road to Kalos
title: GO Pass: Road to Kalos
description: From Monday, February 23, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, March 1, at 6:00 p.m. local time, the GO Pass and the GO Pass Deluxe for Road to Kalos will be available in Pokémon GO!

name: [Promo Code] GO Tour Fairy Type Timed Research
title: [Promo Code] GO Tour Fairy Type Timed Research
description: All Trainers can redeem the following code to receive Fairy type Timed Research available starting with Pokémon GO Tour in person events. Code: TH4NKY0UF41RYMUCH Quick Redeem: https://store.pokemongo.com/offer-redemption?passcode=TH4NKY0UF41RYMUCH It is not clear when this promo code will expire. The dates shown on this page are for the Timed Research.

name: Memories in Motion
title: Memories in Motion
description: Welcome to Pokémon GO: Memories in Motion! In Pokémon GO, Seasons are periods of time that feature new events, Pokémon debuts, and surprises that all follow a certain theme. As the Seasons change, you may find different Pokémon appearing in your area and hatching from Eggs. Make sure to explore during each in-game Season to collect and train as many different Pokémon as you can! You’ll also enjoy special bonuses as you do.
